name: Scraps (mciric, Polo9882, Zobral)
description:
This is a 2 players vs 2 players game taking place on flying boats. The two teams have to destroy the other's ship with cannons while repairing theirs with a hammer. 5 shots taken without any repairing done make the team lose the game. Cooperation is then necessary to win.

How to play:
Get the projectiles from the source to the cannons to shoot, keep your Hull in good shape by repairing it with the Hammer !
